author: deguio
body:
following the dataset update:
`DoubleEG, SinglePhoton, SingleElectron -> EGamma`

the alcareco matrix is updated.
the `"MET" : "HcalCalNoise"` is also removed since it is deprecated.

not sure what the policy is for updating the `autoAlca.py`. moreover, if this same matrix is used for relvals, this update isn't backward compatible.

I let @trtomei @arunhep @lpernie comment on the details.


@mariadalfonso @bsunanda
title: update alcareco matrix for 2018 data taking
